snippet: Human Rights Watch said that under pressure from China, the Nepalese government is repressing Tibetan refugees.
abstract: Human Rights Watch reports that Nepalese government, under pressure from China, restricts political freedoms of Tibetan refugees living in Nepal, subjects them to abuse and harassment by security forces and spies on them for Chinese officials.

byline.original: By EDWARD WONG and BHADRA SHARMA
byline.contributor: Edward Wong reported from Beijing, and Bhadra Sharma from Katmandu, Nepal.

lead_paragraph: Human Rights Watch said that under pressure from China, the Nepalese government is repressing Tibetan refugees.

headline.main: Tibetans Repressed in Nepal, Rights Group Finds
headline.print_headline: Tibetans Repressed in Nepal, Rights Group Finds

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
